text: Silver Linings Playbook is a 2012 American romantic drama movie. It stars Bradley Cooper as a bipolar man who has recently been discharged from a psychiatric hospital, where he was sent after attacking his wife's lover. Jennifer Lawrence as Tiffany and Robert De Niro as Pat Sr. This movie is set in Pennsylvania in 2008. It was based on the novel of the same name. Most movie critics gave the movie good reviews. == Other websites == * Category:2012 romantic drama movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:Bipolar disorder in fiction Category:2010s English-language movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies set in Pennsylvania Category:Movies set in the 2000s Category:Movies directed by David O. Russell Category:Movies featuring a Best Actress Academy Award-winning performance
title: Silver Linings Playbook
